price: 70. Chaque âme sera pleinement rétribuée selon ce qu’elle faisait, et Lui est le Meilleur à Savoir ce qu’ils font.
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahuwa aʿlamu bimā yafʿalūna
